LeFrak Center and R&D Center construction timeline

Barnard first announces the R&D Center.

Spring

2022

Construction of the LeFrak Center begins, starting with asbestos

treatment in Barnard Hall.

Summer

2022

Fall

2022

Demolition begins on first floor of Barnard Hall.

Major construction work begins in Barnard Hall. Early work begins in Altschul Hall.

Spring

2023

Construction begins in Altschul Hall.

Fall

2023

Soft opening of LeFrak Center. Certain support spaces and corridors may open up prior to fall 2024.

Spring

2024

Altschul Hall faculty and staff move to new spaces.

Summer

2024

A formal and full opening of the LeFrak Center. Closure of Altschul Hall.

Fall

2024

Winter

2025

Winter

2026

Spring

2026

Official opening of the R&D Vagelos Science Center.

Sources: Barnard Builds, Barnard Spokesperson,

Columbia Daily Spectator

Graphic by Diya Nair

LeFrak Center and R&D Center construction timeline

Spring 2022

Barnard first announces the R&D Center.

Construction of the LeFrak Center begins, starting with asbestos treatment in Barnard Hall.

Summer 2022

Fall 2022

Demolition begins on first floor of Barnard Hall.

Major construction work begins in Barnard Hall. Early work begins in Altschul Hall.

Spring 2023

Fall 2023

Construction begins in Altschul Hall.

Soft opening of LeFrak Center. Certain support spaces and corridors may open up prior to fall 2024.

Spring 2024

Altschul Hall faculty and staff move to new spaces.

Summer 2024

A formal and full opening of the LeFrak Center. Closure of Altschul Hall.

Fall 2024

Winter 2025

Winter 2026

Spring 2026

Official opening of the R&D Vagelos Science Center.

Sources: Barnard Builds, Barnard Spokesperson, Columbia Daily Spectator
